text: Solaris () is a 1968 Soviet movie directed by Boris Nirenburg and Lidiya Ishimbayeva.1968 годСОЛЯРИС (1968) It stars Vasily Lanovoy, Vladimir Etush, and Viktor Zozulin. ==Actors== * Vasily Lanovoy as Dr. Kris Kelvin * Vladimir Etush as Dr. Snaut * Viktor Zozulin as Dr. Sartorius * Antonina Pilyus as Harey == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1968 movies
title: Solaris (1968 movie)
